original: gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par yang byed do //
analyzed: gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par yang byed do //
translated: They also make the conventional designation that the other is false.

original: de ni de dag gis phyis nye bar brtag par bya dgos pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni de dag gis phyis nye bar brtag par bya dgos pa yin no //
translated: This is something that they must later investigate.

original: de la sems can gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa /
analyzed: de la sems can gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa /
translated: “Among them, those sentient beings who are not of childish nature,

original: bden pa mthong ba /
analyzed: bden pa mthong ba /
translated: who have seen the truth,

original: shes rab 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa thob pa /
analyzed: shes rab 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa thob pa /
translated: who have attained the noble, supramundane wisdom,

original: chos thams cad kyi brjod du med pa'i chos nyid mngon par shes pa de dag ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas de dag mthong ngam thos na 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi brjod du med pa'i chos nyid mngon par shes pa de dag ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas de dag mthong ngam thos na 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: and who have realized the inexpressible reality of all phenomena, when they see or hear about those conditioned and unconditioned phenomena, think as follows:

original: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas snang ba gang yin pa de ni med kyi /
analyzed: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas snang ba gang yin pa de ni med kyi /
translated: ‘The appearance of conditioned and unconditioned phenomena does not exist.

original: gang la 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi 'du shes dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi rnam grangs kyi 'du shes 'byung ba dang / rnam par rtog pa las byung ba 'du byed kyi mtshan ma sgyu ma lta bu 'di ni yod do //
analyzed: gang la 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi 'du shes dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi rnam grangs kyi 'du shes 'byung ba dang / rnam par rtog pa las byung ba 'du byed kyi mtshan ma sgyu ma lta bu 'di ni yod do //
translated: However, this illusory appearance of conditioned and unconditioned phenomena, which arises from conceptualization and is a sign of conditioned phenomena, does exist.’

original: blo rnam par rmongs par byed pa 'di ni yod do snyam du sems shing /🔽de dag ji ltar mthong ba dang / ji ltar thos pa bzhin du /
analyzed: blo rnam par rmongs par byed pa 'di ni yod do snyam du sems shing / de dag ji ltar mthong ba dang / ji ltar thos pa bzhin du /
translated: They think, ‘This confusion of the mind exists.’

original: de la nan gyis mchog tu gzung zhing mngon par zhen @46a * //
analyzed: de la nan gyis mchog tu gzung zhing mngon par zhen @46a * //
translated: They insistently hold on to and cling to what they have seen and heard,

original: pa 'di ni bden gyi /
analyzed: pa 'di ni bden gyi /
translated: thinking, ‘This is true.

original: gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad mi 'dogs kyi /
analyzed: gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rjes su tha snyad mi 'dogs kyi /
translated: The rest is false.’

original: 'di ltar don rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: 'di ltar don rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed de /
translated: They do not make conventional designations in this way, but they do make conventional designations in order to make known the meaning.

original: de ni de dag gis phyis nye bar brtag par bya mi dgos pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni de dag gis phyis nye bar brtag par bya mi dgos pa yin no //
translated: Later, they do not need to investigate it.

original: rigs kyi bu de ltar na 'phags pa rnams kyi dngos po de 'phags pa'i ye shes dang 'phags pa'i mthong bas rjes su brjod du med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu de ltar na 'phags pa rnams kyi dngos po de 'phags pa'i ye shes dang 'phags pa'i mthong bas rjes su brjod du med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing //
translated: Son of noble family, in this way, the noble ones have fully awakened to the fact that this thing is inexpressible through noble wisdom and noble vision.

original: brjod du med pa'i chos nyid de nyid mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas zhes ming du btags pa yin no //
analyzed: brjod du med pa'i chos nyid de nyid mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas zhes ming du btags pa yin no //
translated: That reality which is inexpressible is designated as compounded and uncompounded in order to realize it completely and perfectly.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' don zab dgongs pa nges par 'grel gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' don zab dgongs pa nges par 'grel gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
translated: Then the bodhisattva Profound Meaning Definitive Explanation spoke these verses:

original: zab mo byis pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa //
analyzed: zab mo byis pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa //
translated: The profound is not the domain of activity of fools.

original: brjod med gnyis min rgyal bas bstan mdzad kyang //
analyzed: brjod med gnyis min rgyal bas bstan mdzad kyang //
translated: The Victor taught the inexpressible, non-dual,

original: byis pa gti mug rmongs pa 'di dag ni //
analyzed: byis pa gti mug rmongs pa 'di dag ni //
translated: But these fools, confused and ignorant,

original: smra pa'i spros la dga' zhing gnyis la gnas //
analyzed: smra pa'i spros la dga' zhing gnyis la gnas //
translated: Delight in the proliferation of speech and abide in duality.

original: ma rtogs pa'am log par rtog pa dag //
analyzed: ma rtogs pa'am log par rtog pa dag //
translated: Those who do not understand or understand incorrectly

original: lug dang ba lang dag tu yang skye zhing //
analyzed: lug dang ba lang dag tu yang skye zhing //
translated: Are born as sheep and cattle.

original: de dag shes pa'i smra ba de ber nas //🔽shin tu yun ring 'khor ba 'dir 'khor 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag shes pa'i smra ba de ber nas // shin tu yun ring 'khor ba 'dir 'khor 'gyur //
translated: Having abandoned the speech of understanding,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: They will wander in this cyclic existence for a very long time.

original: de la rtog ge'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid ni dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: de la rtog ge'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid ni dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin blta bar bya ste /
translated: The defining characteristics of the object that is beyond the domain of logicians should be understood as they are taught in the Sūtra Unravelling the Intended Meaning.

original: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The bodhisattva Dharmodgata said to the Bhagavat:

original: bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi dus rnams kyi shin tu snga ba zhig na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi dus rnams kyi shin tu snga ba zhig na /
translated: “Bhagavat, in a very distant past

original: 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung bdun cu rtsa bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na /
analyzed: 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung bdun cu rtsa bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na /
translated: beyond as many eons as there are sand particles in the Ganges River,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rgya chen gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams grags pa can zhes bgyi ba der bdag mchis pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rgya chen gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams grags pa can zhes bgyi ba der bdag mchis pa'i tshe /
translated: I was in the buddha realm of the tathāgata Vastly Famous, in the world system called Renowned,

original: de na bdag gis mu stegs can rang rang gi ston pa la sogs pa 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de na bdag gis mu stegs can rang rang gi ston pa la sogs pa 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun 'di lta ste /
translated: where I saw seven hundred seventy million tīrthikas, each with their own teacher,

original: chos rnams kyi don dam pa'i mtshan nyid bsams pa las brtsams nas /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi don dam pa'i mtshan nyid bsams pa las brtsams nas /
translated: who were engaged in speculation about the ultimate characteristics of phenomena.

original: sa phyogs zhig na mchis shing 'dus nas /
analyzed: sa phyogs zhig na mchis shing 'dus nas /
translated: They are gathered in a certain place,

original: de dag chos rnams kyi don dam pa'i mtshan nyid sems par bgyid //🔽'jal par bgyid //
analyzed: de dag chos rnams kyi don dam pa'i mtshan nyid sems par bgyid // 'jal par bgyid //
translated: and they are reflecting on the ultimate characteristics of phenomena,🔽they are measuring,

original: nye bar rtog par bgyid /
analyzed: nye bar rtog par bgyid /
translated: they are investigating,

original: yongs su @46b tshol bar bgyid kyang ma rtogs nas //🔽blo gros tha dad pa /
analyzed: yongs su @46b tshol bar bgyid kyang ma rtogs nas // blo gros tha dad pa /
translated: they are seeking, but they have not understood.🔽They have different ideas,

original: yid gnyis can /
analyzed: yid gnyis can /
translated: they are doubtful,

original: blo gros ngan pa /
analyzed: blo gros ngan pa /
translated: they have bad ideas,🔽they argue and dispute,

original: rtsod pa dang / 'gyed par gyur pa dag / gcig la gcig kha stobs kyis gnod pa bgyis //🔽zher 'debs pa bgyis //🔽gab gab kyis gnon pa bgyis //
analyzed: rtsod pa dang / 'gyed par gyur pa dag / gcig la gcig kha stobs kyis gnod pa bgyis // zher 'debs pa bgyis // gab gab kyis gnon pa bgyis //
translated: they harm each other with the strength of their words,🔽they revile each other,

original: tshar gcad par bgyid de /
analyzed: tshar gcad par bgyid de /
translated: they suppress each other with their power,🔽they defeat each other.

original: so sor mchis pa dag cig mthong nas //
analyzed: so sor mchis pa dag cig mthong nas //
translated: Having seen them gathered separately,

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di snyam bgyid de /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di snyam bgyid de /
translated: Blessed One, I thought this:

original: kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung zhing //
analyzed: kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung zhing //
translated: “Alas! The Thus-Gone Ones appear in the world,

original: de dag byung bas don dam pa rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta bu rtog pa dang mngon sum du bgyi ba mchis pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lags so snyam bgyid lags so //🔽de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis /
analyzed: de dag byung bas don dam pa rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta bu rtog pa dang mngon sum du bgyi ba mchis pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lags so snyam bgyid lags so // de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis /
translated: Therefore, it is amazing and marvelous that the ultimate, which is characterized as being beyond all conceptualization, can be realized by conceptual thought and direct perception.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Blessed One replied to the bodhisattva Dharmodgata:

original: chos 'phags de de bzhin no //
analyzed: chos 'phags de de bzhin no //
translated: “Dharmodgata, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /🔽ngas ni don dam pa rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te / ngas ni don dam pa rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
translated: It is so!🔽I have fully awakened to the ultimate, which is characterized as being beyond all conceptualization.

original: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang bsnyad cing gsal bar byas //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang bsnyad cing gsal bar byas //
translated: Having fully awakened to it, I have explained it, made it clear,

original: rnam par phye /🔽gdags pa byas /
analyzed: rnam par phye / gdags pa byas /
translated: revealed it,🔽designated it,

original: rab tu bstan to //
analyzed: rab tu bstan to //
translated: and taught it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: don dam pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi so so rang gis rig pa yin par ngas bshad la /
analyzed: don dam pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi so so rang gis rig pa yin par ngas bshad la /
translated: I have explained that the ultimate is the individual knowledge of the noble ones.

original: so so'i skye bo rnams kyi phan tshun rig par bya ba ni rtog ge'i spyod yul yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo rnams kyi phan tshun rig par bya ba ni rtog ge'i spyod yul yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the mutual knowledge of ordinary beings is the domain of sophistry.

original: chos 'phags de'i phyir rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de na don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: chos 'phags de'i phyir rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de na don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Dharmodgata, for this reason, by this method, you should know that that which has the characteristic of being utterly beyond all sophistry is the ultimate.

original: chos 'phags gzhan yang don dam pa ni mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul yin par ngas bshad la /
analyzed: chos 'phags gzhan yang don dam pa ni mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul yin par ngas bshad la /
translated: Dharmodgata, moreover, I have explained that the ultimate is the domain of the absence of signs,

original: rtog ge ni mtshan ma'i spyod yul yin te /
analyzed: rtog ge ni mtshan ma'i spyod yul yin te /
translated: whereas sophistry is the domain of signs.

original: chos 'phags de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: chos 'phags de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Dharmodgata, for this reason, by this method, you should know that that which has the characteristic of being utterly beyond all sophistry is the ultimate.

original: chos 'phags gzhan yang don dam pa ni brjod du med pa yin par ngas bshad la /
analyzed: chos 'phags gzhan yang don dam pa ni brjod du med pa yin par ngas bshad la /
translated: Dharmodgata, moreover, I have explained that the ultimate is inexpressible,

original: rtog ge ni brjod pa'i spyod yul yin te /
analyzed: rtog ge ni brjod pa'i spyod yul yin te /
translated: whereas sophistry is the domain of expression.

original: chos 'phags de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rtog ge thams @47a * //
analyzed: chos 'phags de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rtog ge thams @47a * //
translated: Dharmodgata, for this reason, through this explanation, you should understand that all logicians are like the congenitally blind.

original: cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Dharmodgata, for this reason, too, you should understand that the ultimate is the characteristic that completely transcends all thought construction.

original: chos 'phags gzhan yang don dam pa ni tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa yin par ngas bshad la /
analyzed: chos 'phags gzhan yang don dam pa ni tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa yin par ngas bshad la /
translated: “Dharmodgata, moreover, I have explained that the ultimate is the complete cessation of all conventional activity,

original: rtog ge ni tha snyad kyi spyod yul yin te /
analyzed: rtog ge ni tha snyad kyi spyod yul yin te /
translated: whereas thought construction is the domain of conventional activity.

original: chos 'phags de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: chos 'phags de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Dharmodgata, for this reason, too, you should understand that the ultimate is the characteristic that completely transcends all thought construction.

original: chos 'phags gzhan yang don dam pa ni rtsod pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa yin par ngas bshad la /
analyzed: chos 'phags gzhan yang don dam pa ni rtsod pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa yin par ngas bshad la /
translated: “Dharmodgata, moreover, I have explained that the ultimate is the complete cessation of all disputes,

original: rtog ge ni rtsod pa'i spyod yul yin te /
analyzed: rtog ge ni rtsod pa'i spyod yul yin te /
translated: whereas thought construction is the domain of disputes.

original: chos 'phags de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: chos 'phags de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Dharmodgata, for this reason, you should understand that the ultimate is that which is characterized by being completely beyond all thought.

original: chos 'phags 'di lta ste /🔽dper na skyes bu gang zag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tsha ba dang kha ba'i ro bsten bsten pas ni sprang rtsi'i ro 'am /
analyzed: chos 'phags 'di lta ste / dper na skyes bu gang zag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tsha ba dang kha ba'i ro bsten bsten pas ni sprang rtsi'i ro 'am /
translated: Dharmodgata, it is like this:

original: sha kha ra'i ro brtag pa'am /🔽rjes su dpag pa'am /
analyzed: sha kha ra'i ro brtag pa'am / rjes su dpag pa'am /
translated: A person who has been accustomed to the tastes of salt and sugar for as long as he has been alive cannot imagine the taste of honey or sugar cane,🔽cannot conceive of it,🔽cannot infer it,

original: mos par mi nus so //
analyzed: mos par mi nus so //
translated: and cannot believe in it.

original: yun ring po nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la mos pa dang 'dod pa'i yongs su gdung ba dag gis yongs su gdungs pas ni nang gi rab tu dben pa'i bde ba gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba la brtag pa'am /🔽rjes su dpag pa'am /
analyzed: yun ring po nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la mos pa dang 'dod pa'i yongs su gdung ba dag gis yongs su gdungs pas ni nang gi rab tu dben pa'i bde ba gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba la brtag pa'am / rjes su dpag pa'am /
translated: Similarly, someone who has been tormented for a long time by the passion of desire and the burning of desire cannot imagine,🔽cannot conceive of,

original: mos par mi nus so //
analyzed: mos par mi nus so //
translated: cannot infer,🔽and cannot believe in the bliss of inner solitude, which is free from all signs of form, sound, smell, taste, and touch.

original: yun ring po nas kun tu smra ba la mos pa kun tu smra ba la mngon par dga' bas ni nang gi mi smra ba 'phags pa'i bden pa la brtag pa'am /🔽rjes su dpag pa'am /🔽mos par mi nus so //
analyzed: yun ring po nas kun tu smra ba la mos pa kun tu smra ba la mngon par dga' bas ni nang gi mi smra ba 'phags pa'i bden pa la brtag pa'am / rjes su dpag pa'am / mos par mi nus so //
translated: Those who for a long time have been devoted to and have delighted in verbal expression are unable to investigate, infer, or believe in the inner, noble truth of silence.🔽Those who for a long time have been devoted to and have delighted in verbal expression are unable to investigate, infer, or believe in the inner, noble truth of silence.🔽Those who for a long time have been devoted to and have delighted in verbal expression are unable to investigate, infer, or believe in the inner, noble truth of silence.

original: yun ring po nas mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i tha snyad la mos pa /
analyzed: yun ring po nas mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i tha snyad la mos pa /
translated: Those who for a long time have been devoted to and have delighted in verbal expression are unable to investigate, infer, or believe in the inner, noble truth of silence.🔽Those who for a long time have been devoted to and have delighted in verbal expression are unable to investigate, infer, or believe in the inner, noble truth of silence.

original: tha snyad la mngon par dga' bas ni tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa 'jig tshogs la 'gog pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la brtag pa'am /🔽rjes su dpag pa'am /
analyzed: tha snyad la mngon par dga' bas ni tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa 'jig tshogs la 'gog pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la brtag pa'am / rjes su dpag pa'am /
translated: Those who for a long time have been devoted to and have delighted in verbal expression are unable to investigate, infer, or believe in the inner, noble truth of silence.

original: mos par mi nus so //🔽chos 'phags 'di lta ste /
analyzed: mos par mi nus so // chos 'phags 'di lta ste /
translated: Those who for a long time have been devoted to and have delighted in verbal expression are unable to investigate, infer, or believe in the inner, noble truth of silence.🔽Those who for a long time have been devoted to and have delighted in verbal expression are unable to investigate, infer, or believe in the inner, noble truth of silence.

original: dper na yun ring po nas bdag gir yongs su 'dzin pa nyid kyis rtsod pa la brtson pa /
analyzed: dper na yun ring po nas bdag gir yongs su 'dzin pa nyid kyis rtsod pa la brtson pa /
translated: Those who for a long time have been devoted to and have delighted in verbal expression are unable to investigate, infer, or believe in the inner, noble truth of silence.🔽Those who for a long time have been devoted to and have delighted in verbal expression are unable to investigate, infer, or believe in the inner, noble truth of silence.🔽Those who for a long time have been devoted to and have delighted in verbal expression are unable to investigate, infer, or believe in the inner, noble truth of silence.🔽Those who for a long time have been devoted to and have delighted in verbal expression are unable to investigate, infer, or believe in the inner, noble truth of silence.

original: rtsod pa la mngon par dga' bas ni byang gi @47b sgra mi snyan pa dag gis bdag gir yongs su 'dzin pa med pa nyid dang / rtsod pa med pa nyid la brtag pa'am /🔽rjes su dpag pa'am /
analyzed: rtsod pa la mngon par dga' bas ni byang gi @47b sgra mi snyan pa dag gis bdag gir yongs su 'dzin pa med pa nyid dang / rtsod pa med pa nyid la brtag pa'am / rjes su dpag pa'am /
translated: Those who delight in disputation cannot conceive, infer, or believe in the absence of appropriation and the absence of disputation in the northern continent of Kuru.

original: mos par mi nus so //🔽chos 'phags de bzhin du rtog ge ba thams cad kyis kyang don dam pa rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid la brtag pa'am /🔽rjes su dpag pa'am //
analyzed: mos par mi nus so // chos 'phags de bzhin du rtog ge ba thams cad kyis kyang don dam pa rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid la brtag pa'am / rjes su dpag pa'am //
translated: They cannot conceive, infer, or believe in the absence of appropriation and the absence of disputation in the northern continent of Kuru.🔽Noble Dharma, likewise, all sophists cannot conceive, infer, or believe in the ultimate, which is characterized by transcendence of all sophistry.

original: mos par mi nus so //
analyzed: mos par mi nus so //
translated: They cannot conceive, infer, or believe in the ultimate, which is characterized by transcendence of all sophistry.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to //
translated: Then the Lord uttered this verse:

original: so so rang rig mtshan med spyod yul te //
analyzed: so so rang rig mtshan med spyod yul te //
translated: The domain of self-cognizance, without characteristics,

original: brjod du med cing tha snyad yongs chad pa //
analyzed: brjod du med cing tha snyad yongs chad pa //
translated: inexpressible, and devoid of conventions,

original: rtsod dang bral ba don dam chos yin te //
analyzed: rtsod dang bral ba don dam chos yin te //
translated: free from disputation, is the ultimate Dharma,

original: de ni rtog ge kun las 'das mtshan nyid //🔽ces gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rtog ge kun las 'das mtshan nyid //🔽ces gsungs pa'o //
translated: characterized by transcendence of all sophistry.

original: de la tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid ni dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin blta bar bya ste //
analyzed: de la tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid ni dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin blta bar bya ste //
translated: The characteristic of the ultimate that transcends difference and non-difference should be understood as it is described in the Samdhinirmocana Sutra.

original: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros shin tu rnam dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros shin tu rnam dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The bodhisattva Suvisuddhamati said to the Bhagavat:

original: bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi slad du 'di skad ces don dam pa ni phra ba zab pa tha dad pa dang tha dad pa nyid ma yin pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs par dka' ba yin no zhes bka' stsal
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi slad du 'di skad ces don dam pa ni phra ba zab pa tha dad pa dang tha dad pa nyid ma yin pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs par dka' ba yin no zhes bka' stsal
translated: “Bhagavat, the Bhagavat has said, ‘The ultimate is subtle, profound, difficult to realize, and has the characteristic of transcending difference and non-difference.’

original: te / ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa de ni ngo mtshar lags so //
analyzed: te / ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa de ni ngo mtshar lags so //
translated: Bhagavat, it is amazing how well that has been said.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag gis phyogs shig na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag gis phyogs shig na /
translated: Bhagavat, in one place I have seen

original: byang chub sems dpa' mos pas spyod pa'i sa la bzhugs pa rab tu mang po dag cig 'di lta ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' mos pas spyod pa'i sa la bzhugs pa rab tu mang po dag cig 'di lta ste /
translated: There were many bodhisattvas who were dwelling on the ground of practice through devotion.

original: 'du byed rnams dang / don dam pa tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma lags pa nyid bsams pa las brtsams te /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams dang / don dam pa tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma lags pa nyid bsams pa las brtsams te /
translated: They were thinking about the ultimate and conditioned things, whether they were different or not.

original: phan tshun nas mchis shing mchis nas 'dus te mchis nas /
analyzed: phan tshun nas mchis shing mchis nas 'dus te mchis nas /
translated: They had come from various buddha realms and had gathered there.

original: de na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma lags so zhes mchi /
analyzed: de na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma lags so zhes mchi /
translated: Some of the bodhisattvas said, “The characteristics of conditioned things and the characteristics of the ultimate are not different.”

original: kha cig ni 'di skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma lags pa ma lags kyi //
analyzed: kha cig ni 'di skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma lags pa ma lags kyi //
translated: Some said, “The characteristics of conditioned things and the characteristics of the ultimate are neither different nor not different.

original: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa lags so zhes mchi /🔽the tshom du gyur pa'i blo gros can yid gnyis su @48a * //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa lags so zhes mchi / the tshom du gyur pa'i blo gros can yid gnyis su @48a * //
translated: The characteristics of conditioned things and the characteristics of the ultimate are different.”🔽Some had doubts and were uncertain.

original: gyur pa kha cig ni 'di skad du //
analyzed: gyur pa kha cig ni 'di skad du //
translated: Some said,🔽“The characteristics of conditioned things and the characteristics of the ultimate are not different.

original: gang dag de skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa lags so zhes mchi ba dang / gang dag de skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma lags so zhes mchi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gang ni mang par mchi ba lags //
analyzed: gang dag de skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa lags so zhes mchi ba dang / gang dag de skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma lags so zhes mchi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gang ni mang par mchi ba lags //
translated: Those who say, The characteristic of the conditioned and the characteristic of the ultimate are different, and those who say, The characteristic of the conditioned and the characteristic of the ultimate are not different, which of those bodhisattvas are many?

original: gang ni sho be mchi ba lags //
analyzed: gang ni sho be mchi ba lags //
translated: Which are few?

original: gang ni tshul bzhin du zhugs pa lags //
analyzed: gang ni tshul bzhin du zhugs pa lags //
translated: Which are correctly engaged?

original: gang ni tshul bzhin ma lags par zhugs pa lags zhes mchi bdag cig mthong lags so //
analyzed: gang ni tshul bzhin ma lags par zhugs pa lags zhes mchi bdag cig mthong lags so //
translated: Which are incorrectly engaged?

original: bcom ldan 'das mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam bgyid de /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam bgyid de /
translated: I saw that and thought, Blessed One, having seen that, I thought this:

original: rigs kyi bu 'di dag thams cad ni 'di ltar don dam pa 'du byed rnams dang tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma lags pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid phra ba ma 'tshal ba //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu 'di dag thams cad ni 'di ltar don dam pa 'du byed rnams dang tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma lags pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid phra ba ma 'tshal ba //
translated: All these sons of good family, in this way, do not understand the subtle characteristic of the ultimate, which is beyond being different or not different from the conditioned.

original: byis pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba /
analyzed: byis pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba /
translated: They are childish, confused, unclear,

original: mi mkhas pa /
analyzed: mi mkhas pa /
translated: unskilled,

original: tshul bzhin ma lags par zhugs pa sha stag lags so snyam bgyid lags so //
analyzed: tshul bzhin ma lags par zhugs pa sha stag lags so snyam bgyid lags so //
translated: and improperly engaged.”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros shin tu rnam dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //🔽blo gros shin tu rnam dag de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros shin tu rnam dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // blo gros shin tu rnam dag de de bzhin no //
translated: The Blessed One said to the bodhisattva Su­viśuddha­mati, “Su­viśuddha­mati, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is so!

original: rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad ni 'di ltar don dam pa 'du byed rnams dang tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid phra ba mi shes pa /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad ni 'di ltar don dam pa 'du byed rnams dang tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid phra ba mi shes pa /
translated: Su­viśuddha­mati, all those sons of noble family are like that, in that they do not understand the subtle characteristic of the ultimate, which is beyond being different from or the same as conditioned phenomena.

original: byis pa / rmongs pa /
analyzed: byis pa / rmongs pa /
translated: They are childish, confused,

original: mi gsal ba /
analyzed: mi gsal ba /
translated: unclear,

original: mi mkhas pa /
analyzed: mi mkhas pa /
translated: unskilled,

original: tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa sha stag yin no //
analyzed: tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa sha stag yin no //
translated: and improperly engaged.”

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: blo gros shin tu rnam dag 'du byed rnams la de ltar so sor rtog pa dag ni don dam pa rtog pa'am /
analyzed: blo gros shin tu rnam dag 'du byed rnams la de ltar so sor rtog pa dag ni don dam pa rtog pa'am /
translated: Su­viśuddha­mati, those who investigate conditioned phenomena in that way will not understand the ultimate.

original: don dam pa mngon sum du byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam pa mngon sum du byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not make the ultimate directly evident.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin par gyur na ni des na byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad bden pa mthong ba yin par yang 'gyur //
analyzed: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin par gyur na ni des na byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad bden pa mthong ba yin par yang 'gyur //
translated: O Viśuddhamati, if the characteristic of the ultimate were not different from the characteristic of the conditioned, then all foolish ordinary beings would see the truth.

original: so so'i skye bo kho nar 'gyur bzhin du grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par yang 'gyur //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo kho nar 'gyur bzhin du grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par yang 'gyur //
translated: While remaining only ordinary beings, they would attain the nirvāṇa that is the highest achievement and happiness.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: They would fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.

original: gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid @48b las don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin par gyur na ni des na bden pa mthong ba rnams kyang //
analyzed: gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid @48b las don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin par gyur na ni des na bden pa mthong ba rnams kyang //
translated: If the characteristic of the ultimate were different from the characteristic of the conditioned, then those who see the truth

original: 'du byed kyi mtshan ma dang ma bral bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi mtshan ma dang ma bral bar 'gyur //
translated: would not be free from the signs of the conditioned.

original: 'du byed kyi mtshan ma dang ma bral ba'i phyir bden pa mthong ba yang mtshan ma'i 'ching ba las rnam par grol bar yang mi 'gyur //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi mtshan ma dang ma bral ba'i phyir bden pa mthong ba yang mtshan ma'i 'ching ba las rnam par grol bar yang mi 'gyur //
translated: Because they are not free from the signs of conditioned things, they do not become liberated from the bondage of signs, even though they have seen the truth.

original: mtshan ma'i 'ching ba las rnam par ma grol na gnas ngan len gyi 'ching ba las kyang rnam par ma grol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i 'ching ba las rnam par ma grol na gnas ngan len gyi 'ching ba las kyang rnam par ma grol bar 'gyur //
translated: If they are not liberated from the bondage of signs, they are not liberated from the bondage of the residues.

original: 'ching ba de gnyis las ma grol na bden ba mthong bas grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par yang mi 'gyur //
analyzed: 'ching ba de gnyis las ma grol na bden ba mthong bas grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par yang mi 'gyur //
translated: If they are not liberated from these two bondages, they do not attain the accomplishment and the unsurpassed security of nirvana by seeing the truth.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

original: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gang gi phyir so so'i skye bo bden pa mthong ba ma yin //
analyzed: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gang gi phyir so so'i skye bo bden pa mthong ba ma yin //
translated: Suviśuddhamati, it is because ordinary beings do not see the truth.

original: so so'i skye bo kho nar 'gyur bzhin du grub pa dang / bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par yang mi 'gyur /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo kho nar 'gyur bzhin du grub pa dang / bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par yang mi 'gyur /
translated: While remaining just ordinary beings, they do not attain the accomplishment and the unsurpassed security of nirvana.

original: bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir //
translated: and they would not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin zhes byar mi rung ste /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin zhes byar mi rung ste /
translated: Therefore, it is not suitable to say that the characteristic of conditioned phenomena and the characteristic of the ultimate are not different.

original: de la gang dag de skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin zhes zer ba de dag ni rnam grangs des na /🔽khyod kyis 'di ltar tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa yin gyi //
analyzed: de la gang dag de skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin zhes zer ba de dag ni rnam grangs des na / khyod kyis 'di ltar tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa yin gyi //
translated: Those who say that the characteristic of conditioned phenomena and the characteristic of the ultimate are not different,🔽you should understand that they have engaged in that in an improper way.

original: tshul bzhin du zhugs pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //🔽blo gros shin tu rnam dag gang gi phyir bden pa mthong ba rnams 'du byed kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: tshul bzhin du zhugs pa ma yin par rig par bya'o // blo gros shin tu rnam dag gang gi phyir bden pa mthong ba rnams 'du byed kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba ma yin gyi /
translated: They have not engaged in it in a proper way.🔽Su­viśuddha­mati, it is because those who see the truth are not free from the signs of conditioned phenomena,

original: bral ba kho na yin pa dang / bden pa mthong ba mtshan ma'i 'ching ba las rnam par ma grol ba ma yin gyi //
analyzed: bral ba kho na yin pa dang / bden pa mthong ba mtshan ma'i 'ching ba las rnam par ma grol ba ma yin gyi //
translated: but are free from them, and those who see the truth are not liberated from the bondage of signs,

original: rnam par grol ba yin pa dang / bden pa mthong ba gnas ngan len gyi 'ching ba las rnam par ma grol ba ma yin gyi //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba yin pa dang / bden pa mthong ba gnas ngan len gyi 'ching ba las rnam par ma grol ba ma yin gyi //
translated: Those who are liberated and have seen the truth are not bound by the fetters of negative propensities.

original: rnam par grol ba yin pa dang / 'ching ba de gnyi ga las rnam par grol na grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ba de'i phyir //🔽'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa zhes byar @49a * //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba yin pa dang / 'ching ba de gnyi ga las rnam par grol na grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ba de'i phyir // 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa zhes byar @49a * //
translated: Those who are liberated and are free from both of those bonds attain the unsurpassed nirvāṇa of accomplishment and bliss and they will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment.

original: mi rung ste /
analyzed: mi rung ste /
translated: Therefore, it is not suitable to say that the characteristics of conditioned phenomena and the characteristics of the ultimate are different.

original: de la gang dag de skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa zhes zer ba de dag ni rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: de la gang dag de skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa zhes zer ba de dag ni rnam grangs des na /
translated: Those who say that the characteristics of conditioned phenomena and the characteristics of the ultimate are different, by that enumeration

original: khyod kyis 'di ltar tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: khyod kyis 'di ltar tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa yin gyi /
translated: you have engaged in incorrect thinking.

original: tshul bzhin du zhugs pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshul bzhin du zhugs pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should understand that they have not engaged in this teaching properly.

original: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gzhan yang gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin par gyur na ni //
analyzed: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gzhan yang gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin par gyur na ni //
translated: “Moreover, Su­viśuddha­mati, if the characteristics of compounded phenomena and the characteristics of the ultimate were not different,

original: des na ji ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid du gtogs pa de bzhin du don dam pa'i mtshan nyid kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid du gtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na ji ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid du gtogs pa de bzhin du don dam pa'i mtshan nyid kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid du gtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then just as the characteristics of compounded phenomena are included in the characteristics of affliction, so too would the characteristics of the ultimate be included in the characteristics of affliction.

original: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang / don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin par gyur na yang des na 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid thams cad la don dam pa'i mtshan nyid ni spyi'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang / don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin par gyur na yang des na 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid thams cad la don dam pa'i mtshan nyid ni spyi'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: “Su­viśuddha­mati, if the characteristics of compounded phenomena and the characteristics of the ultimate were different, then the characteristics of the ultimate would not be the general characteristics of all the characteristics of compounded phenomena.

original: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gang gi phyir don dam pa'i mtshan nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid du gtogs pa ma yin pa dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid thams cad la don dam pa'i mtshan nyid spyi'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de'i phyir //
analyzed: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gang gi phyir don dam pa'i mtshan nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid du gtogs pa ma yin pa dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid thams cad la don dam pa'i mtshan nyid spyi'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de'i phyir //
translated: “O thoroughly pure intellect! It is because the characteristic of the ultimate is not included in the characteristic of the afflictions, and because the characteristic of the ultimate is the general characteristic of all the characteristics of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin zhes byar yang mi rung la /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin zhes byar yang mi rung la /
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable to say that the characteristic of the ultimate and the characteristic of conditioned phenomena are not different.

original: don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa zhes byar yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa zhes byar yang mi rung ste /
translated: It is also not tenable to say that the characteristic of the ultimate and the characteristic of conditioned phenomena are different.

original: de la gang dag de skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang / don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin zhes zer ba dang / don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa zhes zer ba de dag ni rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: de la gang dag de skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang / don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin zhes zer ba dang / don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa zhes zer ba de dag ni rnam grangs des na /
translated: Those who say that the characteristic of the ultimate and the characteristic of conditioned phenomena are not different or that they are different,

original: khyod kyis 'di ltar tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa yin gyi //
analyzed: khyod kyis 'di ltar tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa yin gyi //
translated: you should understand that they have engaged in this topic incorrectly.

original: tshul bzhin du zhugs pa ni ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshul bzhin du zhugs pa ni ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that they have not properly engaged with it.

original: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gzhan yang gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin par gyur na ni //
analyzed: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gzhan yang gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin par gyur na ni //
translated: “Moreover, Pure Intellect, if the characteristics of conditioned phenomena and the characteristics of the ultimate were not different,

original: des na ji ltar don dam pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad la bye brag med pa de bzhin du //
analyzed: des na ji ltar don dam pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad la bye brag med pa de bzhin du //
translated: then just as the characteristics of the ultimate are undifferentiated,

original: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid thams cad kyang bye brag med par 'gyur ba dang / rnal 'byor pa dag 'du byed rnams la ji ltar mthong ba dang / ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar bye brag phyed pa dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa las gong du don dam pa yongs su tshol bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid thams cad kyang bye brag med par 'gyur ba dang / rnal 'byor pa dag 'du byed rnams la ji ltar mthong ba dang / ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar bye brag phyed pa dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa las gong du don dam pa yongs su tshol bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the characteristics of conditioned phenomena would also be undifferentiated. And yogins and yoginīs would not seek the ultimate beyond what they see, hear, distinguish, and cognize with regard to conditioned phenomena.

original: gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang / don dam @49b pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin par gyur na ni des na 'du byed rnams kyi bdag med pa tsam dang / ngo bo nyid med pa tsam nyid don dam pa'i mtshan nyid yin par yang mi 'gyur //
analyzed: gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang / don dam @49b pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin par gyur na ni des na 'du byed rnams kyi bdag med pa tsam dang / ngo bo nyid med pa tsam nyid don dam pa'i mtshan nyid yin par yang mi 'gyur //
translated: If the characteristics of formations and the characteristics of the ultimate were different, then the mere selflessness and the mere naturelessness of formations would not be the characteristics of the ultimate.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid kyang dus gcig tu mtshan nyid tha dad dud grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid kyang dus gcig tu mtshan nyid tha dad dud grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The characteristics of affliction and the characteristics of purification would also be established as different characteristics at the same time.

original: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gang gi phyir 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid rnams ni bye brag yod pa yin te /
analyzed: blo gros shin tu rnam dag gang gi phyir 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid rnams ni bye brag yod pa yin te /
translated: O Viśuddhamatī, because the characteristics of formations are distinct,

original: bye brag med pa ma yin pa dang / rnal 'byor pa dag 'du byed rnams la ji ltar mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa las gong du don dam pa yongs su tshol bar byed pa dang /
analyzed: bye brag med pa ma yin pa dang / rnal 'byor pa dag 'du byed rnams la ji ltar mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa las gong du don dam pa yongs su tshol bar byed pa dang /
translated: not indistinct, and because yogins and yoginīs seek the ultimate beyond what is seen, heard, distinguished, and cognized with regard to formations,

original: don dam pa ni 'du byed rnams kyi bdag med pas rab tu phye ba yin pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid kyang dus gcig tu mtshan nyid tha dad du grub pa med pa de'i phyir /🔽'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa'am //
analyzed: don dam pa ni 'du byed rnams kyi bdag med pas rab tu phye ba yin pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid kyang dus gcig tu mtshan nyid tha dad du grub pa med pa de'i phyir / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa'am //
translated: The ultimate is distinguished by the selflessness of compounded phenomena, and the characteristics of affliction and purification are not established as different characteristics at the same time.

original: tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes byar mi rung ngo //🔽de la gang dag 'di skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes byar mi rung ngo // de la gang dag 'di skad ces 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am /
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable to say that the characteristic of compounded phenomena and the characteristic of the ultimate are either different or not different.🔽Those who say that the characteristic of compounded phenomena and the characteristic of the ultimate are either different or not different,

original: tha dad pa zhes zer ba de dag ni rnam grangs des na /🔽khyod kyi 'di ltar tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa yin gyi //
analyzed: tha dad pa zhes zer ba de dag ni rnam grangs des na / khyod kyi 'di ltar tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa yin gyi //
translated: due to this explanation,🔽you have engaged in this in an improper manner.

original: tshul bzhin du zhugs pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshul bzhin du zhugs pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that you have engaged in this in an improper manner.

original: blo gros shin tu rnam dag 'di lta ste /
analyzed: blo gros shin tu rnam dag 'di lta ste /
translated: Su­viśuddha­mati, it is like this:

original: dper na dung gi dkar po nyid ni dung dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am //
analyzed: dper na dung gi dkar po nyid ni dung dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am //
translated: For example, the whiteness of a conch is not a different characteristic from the conch,

original: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par sla ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par sla ba ma yin no //
translated: and it is not easy to designate it as a different characteristic.

original: dung gi dkar po nyid ji lta ba bzhin du /
analyzed: dung gi dkar po nyid ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: Just as it is with the whiteness of a conch,

original: gser gyi ser po nyid kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: gser gyi ser po nyid kyang de bzhin no //
translated: so it is with the yellowness of gold.

original: pi wang gi sgra'i snyan pa nyid kyang pi wang gi sgra nyid dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am //
analyzed: pi wang gi sgra'i snyan pa nyid kyang pi wang gi sgra nyid dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am //
translated: The pleasantness of the sound of a lute is not a different characteristic from the sound of the lute,

original: mtshan nyid tha dad par gdags par sla ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad par gdags par sla ba ma yin no //
translated: and it is not easy to designate it as a different characteristic.

original: aa ka ru nag po'i dri zhim po nyid kyang aa ka ru nag po dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: aa ka ru nag po'i dri zhim po nyid kyang aa ka ru nag po dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am /
translated: The fragrance of black agarwood is not a different characteristic from the black agarwood,

original: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par sla ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par sla ba ma yin no //
translated: and it is not easy to designate it as a different characteristic.

original: na le sham gyi tsha ba nyid kyang na le sham dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am //
analyzed: na le sham gyi tsha ba nyid kyang na le sham dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am //
translated: The spiciness of ginger is not a different characteristic from the ginger,

original: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par sla ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par sla ba ma yin no //
translated: and it is not easy to designate it as a different characteristic.

original: na le sham gyi tsha ba nyid ji ltar ba bzhin du aa ru ra'i bska ba nyid kyang de bzhin @50a * //🔽no ; /'di lta ste /🔽dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'i 'jam pa nyid kyang shing bal gyi 'da' ba dang mtshan nyid tha pa ma yin pa'am //
analyzed: na le sham gyi tsha ba nyid ji ltar ba bzhin du aa ru ra'i bska ba nyid kyang de bzhin @50a * // no ; /'di lta ste / dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'i 'jam pa nyid kyang shing bal gyi 'da' ba dang mtshan nyid tha pa ma yin pa'am //
translated: Just as the pungency of black pepper is, so is the astringency of myrobalan.🔽For example, the softness of cotton wool is not easy to designate as the same characteristic as the cotton wool,

original: mtshan nyid tha dad par gdags par sla ba ma yin no //🔽'di lta ste /🔽dper na mar la mar gyi snying khu yang mar dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am //
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad par gdags par sla ba ma yin no // 'di lta ste / dper na mar la mar gyi snying khu yang mar dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am //
translated: or as a different characteristic.🔽For example, the essence of butter is not easy to designate as the same characteristic as the butter,

original: mtshan nyid tha dad par gdags par sla ba ma yin no //🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad par gdags par sla ba ma yin no // 'di lta ste /
translated: or as a different characteristic.🔽For example, impermanence in all conditioned things, suffering in all contaminated things, and the selflessness of all phenomena are not the same characteristic as those,

original: dper na 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag pa nyid dang / zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad la sdug bsngal ba nyid dang / chos thams cad la gang zag gi bdag med pa nyid kyang de dag dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am //
analyzed: dper na 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag pa nyid dang / zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad la sdug bsngal ba nyid dang / chos thams cad la gang zag gi bdag med pa nyid kyang de dag dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am //
translated: or a different characteristic.

original: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par sla ba ma yin no /
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par sla ba ma yin no /
translated: It is not easy to designate them as having different characteristics.

original: blo gros shin tu rnam dag 'di lta ste /
analyzed: blo gros shin tu rnam dag 'di lta ste /
translated: “Suviśuddhamati, it is like this:

original: dper na 'dod chags kyi ma zhi ba'i mtshan nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang 'dod chags pa dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: dper na 'dod chags kyi ma zhi ba'i mtshan nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang 'dod chags pa dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am /
translated: For example, the characteristic of the non-peacefulness of desire and the characteristic of the thorough affliction of desire are not different characteristics from desire,🔽and it is not easy to designate them as having different characteristics.

original: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par sla ba ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags kyi ji lta ba bzhin du zhe sdang dang gti mug gi yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par sla ba ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags kyi ji lta ba bzhin du zhe sdang dang gti mug gi yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: Just as with desire, so it is with hatred and ignorance.

original: blo gros shin tu rnam dag de bzhin du 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am //
analyzed: blo gros shin tu rnam dag de bzhin du 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'am //
translated: “Suviśuddhamati, in the same way, the characteristic of conditioning and the characteristic of the ultimate are not different characteristics,

original: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par mi bzod do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad du gdags par mi bzod do //
translated: and it is not possible to designate them as having different characteristics.

original: blo gros shin tu rnam dag ngas ni de ltar don dam pa /
analyzed: blo gros shin tu rnam dag ngas ni de ltar don dam pa /
translated: “Suviśuddhamati, I have taught that the ultimate

original: phra ba / mchog tu phra ba /
analyzed: phra ba / mchog tu phra ba /
translated: is subtle, supremely subtle,

original: zab pa / mchog tu zab pa /
analyzed: zab pa / mchog tu zab pa /
translated: profound, supremely profound,

original: rtogs par dka' ba /
analyzed: rtogs par dka' ba /
translated: and difficult to realize.

original: mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
translated: Having fully awakened to the characteristics that transcend being different or non-different, which is extremely difficult to realize,

original: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang bsnyad cing gsal bar byas /🔽rnam par phye /
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang bsnyad cing gsal bar byas / rnam par phye /
translated: having fully awakened, he taught, clarified,🔽analyzed,

original: gdags pa byas rab tu bstan to //
analyzed: gdags pa byas rab tu bstan to //
translated: and fully revealed.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to /
translated: Then the Bhagavān spoke these verses:

original: 'du byed khams dang don dam mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: 'du byed khams dang don dam mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The characteristics of the compositional element and the ultimate

original: gcig dang tha dad bral ba'i mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: gcig dang tha dad bral ba'i mtshan nyid de //
translated: are free from being the same or different.

original: gcig dang tha dad nyid du gang rtog pa /
analyzed: gcig dang tha dad nyid du gang rtog pa /
translated: Those who conceive of them as the same or different

original: de dag tshul bzhin ma yin zhugs pa yin //
analyzed: de dag tshul bzhin ma yin zhugs pa yin //
translated: are engaging in what is not correct.

original: skye ba po yis lhag mthong dang / zhi gnas goms par byas nas ni //
analyzed: skye ba po yis lhag mthong dang / zhi gnas goms par byas nas ni //
translated: The one who is born, having cultivated insight and śamatha,

original: gnas ngan len gyi mching ba dang / mtshan ma'i 'ching @50b las rnam grol 'gyur //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gnas ngan len gyi mching ba dang / mtshan ma'i 'ching @50b las rnam grol 'gyur //🔽zhes gsungs so //
translated: will be liberated from the bonds of negative tendencies and the bonds of signs.

original: de la thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid ni dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin blta bar bya ste bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan par rab 'bor la bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: de la thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid ni dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin blta bar bya ste bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan par rab 'bor la bka' stsal pa //
translated: The characteristic of being of one taste everywhere should be seen as it is described in the Samdhinirmocana Sutra. The Bhagavat said to the venerable Subhuti:

original: rab 'byor khyod kyis sems can gyi khams na /
analyzed: rab 'byor khyod kyis sems can gyi khams na /
translated: “Subhuti, do you know how many beings there are in the realm of beings

original: gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis mngon du zin cing //
analyzed: gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis mngon du zin cing //
translated: who are conceited, who are conceited with the conceit of🔽knowing,🔽and who are conceited with the conceit of knowing that they know?🔽Do you know how many beings there are in the realm of beings🔽who are not conceited, who are not conceited with the conceit of🔽knowing,

original: shes pa brda sprod par byed pa'i sems can ni ji tsam zhig yod par shes //
analyzed: shes pa brda sprod par byed pa'i sems can ni ji tsam zhig yod par shes //
translated: and who are not conceited with the conceit of knowing that they know?”

original: khyod kyis sems can gyi khams na /
analyzed: khyod kyis sems can gyi khams na /
translated: Subhuti replied:🔽“Bhagavat, I do not know how many beings there are in the realm of beings who are conceited, who are conceited with the conceit of knowing,🔽and who are conceited with the conceit of knowing that they know.🔽Bhagavat, I do not know how many beings there are in the realm of beings who are not conceited, who are not conceited with the conceit of knowing,🔽and who are not conceited with the conceit of knowing that they know.🔽Bhagavat, I do not know how many beings there are in the realm of beings who are not conceited, who are not conceited with the conceit of knowing,🔽and who are not conceited with the conceit of knowing that they know.🔽Bhagavat, I do not know how many beings there are in the realm of beings who are not conceited, who are not conceited with the conceit of knowing,🔽and who are not conceited with the conceit of knowing that they know.🔽Bhagavat, I do not know how many beings there are in the realm of beings who are not conceited, who are not conceited with the conceit of knowing,🔽and who are not conceited with the conceit of knowing that they know.🔽Bhagavat, I do not know how many beings there are in the realm of beings who are not conceited, who are not conceited with the conceit of knowing,🔽and who are not conceited with the conceit of knowing that they know.🔽Bhagavat, I do not know how many beings there are in the realm of beings who are not conceited, who are not conceited with the conceit of knowing,

original: gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal med par shes pa brda sprod par byed pa'i sems can ji tsam zhig yod par shes /
analyzed: gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal med par shes pa brda sprod par byed pa'i sems can ji tsam zhig yod par shes /
translated: and who are not conceited with the conceit of knowing that they know.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa //
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa //
translated: Bhagavat, I do not

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can gyi khams na gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis par shes pa brda sprod par bgyid pa'i sems can ni nyung shas cig mchis par 'tshal ba lags kyi //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can gyi khams na gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis par shes pa brda sprod par bgyid pa'i sems can ni nyung shas cig mchis par 'tshal ba lags kyi //
translated: Blessed One, I know that in the realm of sentient beings there are very few sentient beings who teach knowledge without pride.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can gyi khams na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can gyi khams na /
translated: Blessed One, in the realm of sentient beings

original: gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal can /🔽mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis mngon du zin cing shes pa brda sprod par byed pa'i sems ca ni tshad ma mchis /🔽grangs ma mchis //
analyzed: gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal can / mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis mngon du zin cing shes pa brda sprod par byed pa'i sems ca ni tshad ma mchis / grangs ma mchis //
translated: there are immeasurable,🔽innumerable,🔽inexpressible numbers of sentient beings who are proud,

original: brjod du ma mchis pa snyed cig mchis par 'tshal lags te /
analyzed: brjod du ma mchis pa snyed cig mchis par 'tshal lags te /
translated: who teach knowledge while being seized by pride.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag dus gcig gis na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag dus gcig gis na /
translated: Blessed One, at one time

original: dgon pa nags khrod chen po zhig na mchis pa'i tshe /
analyzed: dgon pa nags khrod chen po zhig na mchis pa'i tshe /
translated: I was in a great forest wilderness.

original: de na bdag gi nye 'khor na dge slong rab tu mang po dag cig kyang dgon pa nags khrod chen po na brten cing gnas lags te /
analyzed: de na bdag gi nye 'khor na dge slong rab tu mang po dag cig kyang dgon pa nags khrod chen po na brten cing gnas lags te /
translated: There, in my vicinity, many monks were also staying in that great forest wilderness.

original: bdag gis snga dro'i dus kyi tshe //
analyzed: bdag gis snga dro'i dus kyi tshe //
translated: In the morning,

original: dge slong de dag phan tshun nas mchis shing mjal nas chos rnam pa sna tshogs dmigs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ston pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid de //
analyzed: dge slong de dag phan tshun nas mchis shing mjal nas chos rnam pa sna tshogs dmigs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ston pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid de //
translated: Those monks, having met and assembled together, teach the realization of various kinds of objects, and thus they communicate their knowledge.

original: de na kha cig ni phung po dmigs pa dang / phung po'i mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / phung po'i skye ba dmigs pa dang / phung po'i 'jig pa dmigs pa dang / phung po 'gog pa dmigs pa dang / phung po 'go pa mngon du bgyi ba dmigs pas shes pa brda spyod par bgyid //
analyzed: de na kha cig ni phung po dmigs pa dang / phung po'i mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / phung po'i skye ba dmigs pa dang / phung po'i 'jig pa dmigs pa dang / phung po 'gog pa dmigs pa dang / phung po 'go pa mngon du bgyi ba dmigs pas shes pa brda spyod par bgyid //
translated: Some of them communicate their knowledge by means of the object of the aggregates, the object of the signs of the aggregates, the object of the arising of the aggregates, the object of the destruction of the aggregates, the object of the cessation of the aggregates, and the object of the realization of the cessation of the aggregates.

original: kha cig phung po'i dmigs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du /🔽kha cig ni skye mched dmigs pas //
analyzed: kha cig phung po'i dmigs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du / kha cig ni skye mched dmigs pas //
translated: Some of them, just as with the object of the aggregates,🔽some with the object of the sense spheres,

original: kha cig ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par @51a * //
analyzed: kha cig ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par @51a * //
translated: some with the object of dependent origination, communicate their knowledge.

original: bgyid / kha cig ni zas dmigs pa dang / zas kyi mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / zas kyi skye ba dmigs pa dang / zas kyi 'jig pa dmigs pa dang / zas 'gog pa dmigs pa dang / zas 'gog pa mngon du bgyi ba dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid /
analyzed: bgyid / kha cig ni zas dmigs pa dang / zas kyi mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / zas kyi skye ba dmigs pa dang / zas kyi 'jig pa dmigs pa dang / zas 'gog pa dmigs pa dang / zas 'gog pa mngon du bgyi ba dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid /
translated: Some teach knowledge by means of the observation of food, the observation of the signs of food, the observation of the arising of food, the observation of the destruction of food, the observation of the cessation of food, and the observation of the realization of the cessation of food.

original: kha cig ni bden pa dmigs pa dang / bden pa'i mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / bden pa yongs su shes pa dmigs pa dang / bden pa spang ba dmigs pa dang / bden pa mngon du bgyid pa dmigs pa dang / bden pa bsgom pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid /
analyzed: kha cig ni bden pa dmigs pa dang / bden pa'i mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / bden pa yongs su shes pa dmigs pa dang / bden pa spang ba dmigs pa dang / bden pa mngon du bgyid pa dmigs pa dang / bden pa bsgom pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid /
translated: Some teach knowledge by means of the observation of the truths, the observation of the signs of the truths, the observation of the understanding of the truths, the observation of the abandonment of the truths, the observation of the realization of the truths, and the observation of the cultivation of the truths.

original: kha cig ni khams dmigs pa dang / khams kyi mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / khams sna tshogs pa nyid dmigs pa dang / khams du ma pa dmigs pa dang / khams 'gog pa dmigs pa dang / khams 'gog pa mngon du bgyid pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid /🔽kha cig ni dran ba nye bar gzhag pa dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bsgom pa dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: kha cig ni khams dmigs pa dang / khams kyi mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / khams sna tshogs pa nyid dmigs pa dang / khams du ma pa dmigs pa dang / khams 'gog pa dmigs pa dang / khams 'gog pa mngon du bgyid pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid / kha cig ni dran ba nye bar gzhag pa dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bsgom pa dmigs pa dang /
translated: Some teach knowledge by means of the observation of the elements, the observation of the characteristics of the elements, the observation of the diversity of the elements, the observation of the multiplicity of the elements, the observation of the cessation of the elements, and the observation of the actualization of the cessation of the elements.🔽Some teach knowledge by means of the observation of the applications of mindfulness, the observation of the characteristics of the applications of mindfulness, the observation of the antidotes to the factors that are incompatible with the applications of mindfulness, the observation of the cultivation of the applications of mindfulness,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma skyes pa skye ba dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa skyes pa gnas pa dang / ma bskyud pa dang / slar zhing 'byung ba dang / 'phel zhing rgyas pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma skyes pa skye ba dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa skyes pa gnas pa dang / ma bskyud pa dang / slar zhing 'byung ba dang / 'phel zhing rgyas pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid /
translated: the observation of the arising of the applications of mindfulness that have not yet arisen, the observation of the abiding, non-forgetting, renewed arising, increase, and expansion of the applications of mindfulness that have arisen,

original: kha cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: kha cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du /
translated: Some focus on the applications of mindfulness,

original: kha cig ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / kha cig ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: kha cig ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / kha cig ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs pa dang /
translated: some focus on the correct exertions, the supports for miraculous abilities, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and some focus on the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mi mthun ba'i phyogs kyi gnyen po dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma skyes pa skye ba dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan ma dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mi mthun ba'i phyogs kyi gnyen po dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma skyes pa skye ba dmigs pa dang /
translated: Some focus on the signs of the noble eightfold path, some focus on the antidotes to the discordant factors of the noble eightfold path, some focus on the cultivation of the noble eightfold path, and some focus on the noble eightfold path that has not arisen arising.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skyes pa gnas pa dang / ma bskyud pa dang / slar zhing @51b 'byung ba dang / 'phel zhing rgyas pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par rig pa dag mthong lags so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skyes pa gnas pa dang / ma bskyud pa dang / slar zhing @51b 'byung ba dang / 'phel zhing rgyas pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par rig pa dag mthong lags so //
translated: I see that they have attained the eightfold noble path, and that they have not lost it, but have it and will have it again, and that it will increase and grow.

original: mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam bgyid de /
analyzed: mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam bgyid de /
translated: “Having seen this, I thought,

original: tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag ni chos rnam pa sna tshogs dmigs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ston pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid cing /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag ni chos rnam pa sna tshogs dmigs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ston pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid cing /
translated: ‘These venerable ones are teaching the knowledge of the transmission of the Dharma by demonstrating the realization of various aspects of the Dharma.

original: 'di ltar don dam pa thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid ma 'tshal bas tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag thams cad ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can /🔽mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis mngon du zin cing /
analyzed: 'di ltar don dam pa thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid ma 'tshal bas tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag thams cad ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can / mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis mngon du zin cing /
translated: However, because they do not know the characteristic of the ultimate, which is the same everywhere, these venerable ones are all conceited.🔽They are teaching the knowledge of the transmission of the Dharma while being conceited.

original: shes pa brda sprod par bgyid pa sha stags lags so snyam bgyid lags so //
analyzed: shes pa brda sprod par bgyid pa sha stags lags so snyam bgyid lags so //
translated: All of them are teaching the knowledge of the transmission of the Dharma while being conceited.’🔽“Bhagavān, the Bhagavān has said,

original: bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi slad du 'di skad ces /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi slad du 'di skad ces /
translated: Blessed One, the Blessed One has said:🔽🔽

original: don dam pa ni phra ba /
analyzed: don dam pa ni phra ba /
translated: The ultimate is subtle,

original: zab pa / rtogs par dka' ba /
analyzed: zab pa / rtogs par dka' ba /
translated: profound, difficult to realize,

original: mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba /
analyzed: mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba /
translated: supremely difficult to realize,

original: thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bka' stsal pa /
translated: and has the characteristic of being of one taste everywhere.

original: ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa de ni ngo mtshar lags te /
analyzed: ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa de ni ngo mtshar lags te /
translated: The Blessed One has spoken well.

original: bcom ldan 'das don dam pa thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di nyid la zhugs pa dang / dge slong du gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang de ltar rtogs par dka' ba lags na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das don dam pa thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di nyid la zhugs pa dang / dge slong du gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang de ltar rtogs par dka' ba lags na /
translated: Blessed One, the characteristic of the ultimate being of one taste everywhere is difficult to realize even for those beings who have entered this very teaching of the Blessed One and become monks.

original: 'di las slad rol pa'i mu stegs can rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
analyzed: 'di las slad rol pa'i mu stegs can rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
translated: How much more so for non-Buddhist tīrthikas?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
